parameters.name: DBClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBClusters](~~129857~~) operation to query the IDs of all AnalyticDB for MySQL clusters within a region.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end time of the query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ* format. The time must be in UTC.

> The end time must be later than the start time. The maximum time range that can be specified is two days.

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description: The key of the performance metric that you want to query. Separate multiple keys with commas (,). For more information about the performance metrics, see [Metric overview](~~2863211~~).

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the cluster.

parameters.name: ResourcePools
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ* format. The time must be in UTC.
